Skraelings, or Skraelingjar are the warriors that guard Miscellania. If you fail to steal from a stall the Miscellania market, they will say: "Get your hands off there!" and attack you.

If you kill them in Miscellania, your popularity rating will decrease, in contrast with the Skraelings in Etceteria.

  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Skraelings may be based off real life Skrælingjar, the name given by the Norse Greenlanders to the Thule people, an Inuit tribe that wandered the arctic.

'''Skraelings''', or '''Skraelingjar''' are the warriors that guard [[Miscellania]]. If you fail to steal from a stall the [[Miscellania]] market, they will say: "Get your hands off there!" and attack you.

If you kill them in [[Miscellania]], your popularity rating will decrease, in contrast with the [[Skraeling (Etceteria)|Skraelings]] in [[Etceteria]].

==Trivia==
*Skraelings may be based off real life [[wikipedia:skræling|Skrælingjar]], the name given by the Norse Greenlanders to the [[wikipedia:Thule people|Thule people]], an Inuit tribe that wandered the arctic.
